hi: Hello! How can I help you?
hello: Hi there! What can I do for you?
where is my order: Please provide your order number, and I'll check the status for you.
recommend: What kind of recommendations are you looking for?
track order: Please provide your order number to check the delivery status.
product search: What product are you looking for?
order confirmation: Please provide your order number to confirm the details.
feedback: I'd love to hear your feedback!
tell me about: What would you like to know more about?
cart: Would you like to view the items in your cart?
shipping information: Can you provide your address for shipping details?
payment: Can I assist you with any payment-related questions?
coupons: Do you have any coupon codes to apply?
what's your name: I'm your friendly chatbot named SEEKSPHERE. What's yours?
search by image: Please upload an image to search for products.
find similar products: I'll find similar products to the one you uploaded.
search by voice: Please speak the product you're looking for.
track shipment: Please provide the tracking number to track your shipment.
cancel order: Let me help you with canceling your order. Please provide the order number.
return item: I can assist with returning an item. Please provide the order number.
modify order: I can help you modify your order. Please provide the order number.
upload image for search: Please upload an image, and I'll find similar products for you.
voice search: Please speak the product you're looking for, and I'll help you find it.
random conversation: Let's chat! What would you like to talk about?
how are you: I'm just a bunch of code, but I'm here to help you!
what's up: Not much, just here to help you!
tell me a joke: Why donot scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
tell me a story: Once upon a time, in a land far, far away...
what's your favorite color: I donot have a favorite color, but I think blue looks nice!
how do you work: I work by analyzing your inputs and giving you the best possible answers!
what's your purpose: My purpose is to assist you with all your e-commerce needs!
can you sing: I can't sing, but I can share some great music recommendations!
good morning: Good morning! How can I help you today?
what's your favorite food: I donot eat, but pizza seems like a popular choice!
what's the time: I donot know the exact time, but you can check your device for that!
do you have a favorite movie: I donot watch movies, but 'The Matrix' is a classic!
are you human: Nope, just a chatbot, but I can help you like one!
what do you like to do: I love helping people like you with their queries!
can you dance: I can't dance, but I can tell you about some cool dance moves!
do you sleep: I donot sleep, I am always here to help you!
do you have friends: I donot have friends, but I am here for you!
can you solve a riddle: Sure, here's one: What has keys but can't open locks?
how old are you: I donot have an age, but I was created to assist you!
do you play games: I donot play games, but I can suggest some fun ones!
do you watch TV: I donot watch TV, but I can help you find some great shows!
can you help with homework: I can certainly try! What subject are you working on?
are you real: I am real in the sense that I am here to assist you, but I am just code!
can you predict the future: I can't predict the future, but I can help you make informed decisions!
what's the meaning of life: I think it's about learning, growing, and helping others!
do you have a favorite book: I donot read books, but '1984' by George Orwell is a good one!
